title: The Secrets of Tunic's In-Game Manual Reminded Me Why I Love Games
description:
This week on Quest Log, Marty takes a look at his time with Tunic and why it's unique in-game manual reminded him why he found his love of games in the first place.

title: Seriously, What’s the Point of Remaking Resident Evil 4? | Slightly Something Else
description:
This week on Slightly Something Else, Yahtzee and Marty discuss the recent Resident Evil 4 remake announcement and why, or why it isn't necessary.

title: Why Celeste's Hazards Being Broken is Good Game Design
description:
In today's episode JM8 delves into the designs of Celeste and why it feels so good to control and play.

If you want to see more game design content a new Anatomy episode will release every other week, or you can subscribe to JM8s personal channel for similar content: https://www.youtube.com/c/JM8GameDesign
